arts.ttl: Alexander-Arnold and Grealish left out of England squad
arts.sum: Elliot Anderson earns a first senior England nod after dazzling for Forest and Under-21s. Rashford and Wharton return; Foden also left out by Tuchel.

arts.ttl: Man United v Burnley predicted line-ups + FPL team news

Picks for every game, starting with Saturday's early clash between Chelsea and Fulham. Pressure is on Amorim as Man Utd host Burnley, and the weekend climaxes with Liverpool vs. Arsenal.

arts.ttl: 'Showdown talks' planned as Amorim faces must-win battle with Burnley
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim will allegedly hold showdown talks with Red Devils chiefs following Saturday's Premier League clash with Burnley.

arts.ttl: Sources: Amorim to lead Man United vs. Burnley
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim is set to be in charge for Manchester United's Premier League fixture against Burnley on Saturday, sources have told ESPN.
